Name: 扶養すべき口@{M}Mouths to Feed
Description: [船員は食料を必要としています。貴方はベルトをきつく締める事が出来ますが、悪い事が起こり始めるでしょう。このカードは飢えが50を超えると出現します。100に到達させないようにして下さい。]@{M}Your crew groans with hunger. [Your crew needs provisions. You can all tighten your belts, but bad things will begin to happen. This card will remain available as long as Hunger is over 50. Don't let Hunger reach 100.]

DefaultEvent.Name: 食欲は満たされた@{M}Appetites satisfied
DefaultEvent.Description: 貴方と貴方の共食い従者は、次の犠牲者を選んだ。閉じたドアの後ろに立ち、待ち、見て、襲う。これでも貴方は慈悲深い方だった...ナイフは恐ろしく鋭かったのだから。残りの船員は滋養たっぷりの、何が入っているか分からないシチューを振る舞われる。彼らは何も知らない。恐らく、知らないほうが良いし知りたくも無いだろう。@{M}You and your cannibal acolytes have selected your next victim. Behind closed doors, you wait, watch, and strike. You are merciful: your knives are sharp. The rest of the crew will benefit from a nourishing, anonymous stew. Perhaps they know nothing: perhaps they don't want to know.

ChildBranches.Name: ご馳走する@{M}Feast
ChildBranches.Description: [この選択肢は、既に共食いを経験した人間にのみ表示されます。]@{M}You will not draw lots. You will pick one by hand. [This option is only available to those who have already turned cannibal.]

DefaultEvent.Name: 迷信の気配@{M}A soupcon of superstition
DefaultEvent.Description: 「硫黄みたいな味だな」技師の仲間が不平を言う。だが、彼は残りを全て平らげた。@{M}"Tastes like sulphur," growls the engineer's mate. But he tucks in with the rest.

ChildBranches.Name: ズッペを食す@{M}Drink Zzoup
ChildBranches.Description: 味はお世辞にも良いとは言えないだろう。しかし今は誰も気にする者など居なかった。@{M}The taste is acquired, rather than popular. But no one is likely to be fussy just now.

DefaultEvent.Name: 人間が食べるには向かない@{M}Unfit for human consumption
DefaultEvent.Description: 一人の志願者が用心深く少しだけ口に含む。「あら...美味しい」彼女が呟く。「鮭みたいな味ね」更に大きくかぶりつく。「何だろうこれ...ガツ、モグ、ゴク...フグッ」フグッと言いながら彼女はそのまま息絶えた。彼女の顔は奇妙なまでに藤色をしていた。貴方は残りを安全裏に全て投げ捨てた。@{M}A volunteer takes a cautious nibble. "It tastes good," she says. "Rather salmony." She takes a larger bite. "Something like, erk, yark, gork, fruh." By "fruh" she is stone dead, her face a peculiar mauve. You dispose safely of the rest of the catch.

ChildBranches.Name: 奇妙な漁獲物を食べる@{M}$Strange Catch -> 奇妙な漁獲物$Consume a Strange Catch
ChildBranches.Description: 美味しそうには見えないし、安全にも見えないが、試してみる価値はあるかもしれない...@{M}It doesn't look appetising, or even safe, but perhaps it's worth the risk...

DefaultEvent.Name: 逃げたぞ!@{M}An escape!
DefaultEvent.Description: 料理人がそれをポットに投げ込もうとした時、突然それは暴れだした!厨房を激しく飛び回って逃げようともがき、最終的に料理人が押さえつける前に銃眼から外に逃げ出してしまったのだ。@{M}As the Cook bears it to the pot, it displays unexpected agility! It escapes, flops frantically across the galley, and is gone through the open port-hole before Cook can reclaim it.

ChildBranches.Name: 生きた標本を食べる@{M}$Live Specimen -> 生体標本$Consume a Live Specimen
ChildBranches.Description: とても気が進まないが、少なくとも新鮮だろう。@{M}It's not attractive, but at least it's fresh.

DefaultEvent.Name: "結局 -"@{M}"Alas - "
DefaultEvent.Description: 包帯巻きの頭を悲観的に振りながら彼は戻ってきた。「私でも、私の持つ全ての技術を割いても、これを安全に処理することは出来ぬ。場所の問題では無い。例え私が故郷で、全ての道具と器を揃えていても、恐らくは無理だ。私は最善を尽くしたと言える。何も出来なかったが。だが聞いてくれ。あいつの脳幹の側にこれが在るのを見つけたのだ -@{M}He returns a sad shake of his bandaged head. "Even I, with all my powers, cannot make this safe. Not here. Had I all my knives and vessels of home, perhaps. I have done my best with it, to no avail. But listen. This is what I found nested in its brain-pipe - "

ChildBranches.Name: 包帯巻きの猛毒使い@{M}Call upon the Bandaged Poissonnier
ChildBranches.Description: 包帯巻きの猛毒使いに、奇妙な漁獲物を食用に処理出来ないか尋ねる。@{M}$Strange Catch -> 奇妙な漁獲物$Perhaps he can render a Strange Catch edible.

DefaultEvent.Name: "結局 -"@{M}"Alas - "
DefaultEvent.Description: 「無理やな。蒸留しても、発酵しても、希釈しても、昇華しても、文字通り煮ても焼いても、駄目ですわ。この生きモンの各部位が - 分子の一つに至るまで - 運用長の靴下みたいな味です」彼は包帯巻きの手を投げ出した。「どうやってそれを知ったかなんぞ聞かんで下さいや。食の探求の為にやらん事なんぞ、私には何一つあらへんのや。」@{M}"It cannot be done. I have distilled, I have fermented, I have rarefied, I have sublimated, I have toasted. Every part of this creature - down to its last atom - tastes like the bosun's socks." He holds up a bandaged hand. "Do not ask me how I know. There is nothing I will not do in pursuit of culinary exploration."

ChildBranches.Name: 包帯巻きの最高料理長@{M}Call upon the Bandaged Chef-Paramount
ChildBranches.Description: 彼に奇妙な漁獲物を食用に処理出来ないか尋ねる。@{M}$Strange Catch -> 奇妙な漁獲物$Ask him to render a Strange Catch edible.

DefaultEvent.Name: Gone in a flash
DefaultEvent.Description: $Live Specimen -> 生体標本$As it nears the boiling pot, the Live Specimen writhes from the Cook's hands. The moment its oily skin touch the flame, it is consumed in a sickly green fire. The Cook can salvage his eyebrows, but not a meal. Only a handful of warped fishbones remain, along with a whiff of sulphur and sardines.

ChildBranches.Name: $Live Specimen -> 生体標本$Consume a Live Specimen
ChildBranches.Description: It's not attractive, but at least it's fresh.
